result.execSummary:
The defendant Danny J Keys was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Huber with standard release conditions if revoked.
Concurrent with: any other sentence.

miscConds.notes: Fine to be paid as a condition of probation.
Not to use or possess any firearms.

Submit to an AODA assessment, follow through with any treatment recommended.  No use or possession of illegal controlled substances or drug paraphernalia. Comply with random urine screens.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Sign Medical Release for Agent.  Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.

If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

timeConds.notes: Huber with Non-Working hours with standard release conditions - consecutive, STAYED,  for use at Agent's discretion.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.
DATED February 17, 2016 Request for adjournment filed by plaintiff.
Filed by the State. Witness list attached.

Defendant Danny J Keys in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  January 8th is the deadline to file motions.  Court will conduct voir dire at the jury trial.  All questions of the parties to be filed by the jury status hearing.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for March 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury status hearing scheduled for March 10, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.
Defendant Danny J Keys in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Danny J Keys in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary Hearing requested.  Preliminary time limits waived.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.

Defendant Danny J Keys in court.  Susan L. Opper appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant indicates his attorney was unable to appear in court today.    Court tolled time limits for preliminary hearing.  Hearing scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 08:15 am.
